name: Xin Zhao
title: the Seneschal of Demacia
lore: Xin Zhao is a resolute warrior loyal to the ruling Lightshield dynasty. Once condemned to the fighting pits of Noxus, he survived countless gladiatorial bouts, but after being freed by Demacian forces, he swore his life and allegiance to these brave liberators. Armed with his favored three-talon spear, Xin Zhao now fights for his adopted kingdom, audaciously challenging any foe, no matter the odds.
blurb: Xin Zhao is a resolute warrior loyal to the ruling Lightshield dynasty. Once condemned to the fighting pits of Noxus, he survived countless gladiatorial bouts, but after being freed by Demacian forces, he swore his life and allegiance to these brave...
allytips: Xin Zhao is a great initiator to combat. Lead the front to start a fight and use your ultimate to do the most damage possible.
Try to position yourself so your ultimate's knockback is most effective.
enemytips: Xin Zhao is a powerful initiator with both his charge and ultimate dealing damage to all units around him. Try having your team stay spread out until he's used his ultimate.
Xin Zhao relies heavily on his Three Talon Strikes for damage and cooldown resets, so preventing him from finishing his combo will have a dramatic effect.

riot_spells.name: Three Talon Strike
riot_spells.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
riot_spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> extra physical damage and reduce his other cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
riot_spells.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.

Slash: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage.
Thrust: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and slows by {{ e6 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Cast time is reduced with Attack Speed provided from items and levels (minimum of 0.4 seconds). Current cast time: {{ f5 }}

Deals 50% less damage to minions.
Lifesteal is 33% effective on both attacks.
Extends the current duration of Xin Zhao's other abilities by {{ f5 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Audacious Charge
riot_spells.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
riot_spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }}<scaleAP> (+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 0.5 seconds.  Charging grants Xin Zhao {{ e3 }}% attack speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Crescent Guard
riot_spells.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ totaldamage }} plus {{ percentcurrenthealthdamage*100 }}% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks them back (max 600 vs monsters).

For {{ missiledefensebaseduration }} seconds after casting this ability, Xin Zhao has increased Awareness and will completely block damage from enemies that are far away. Xin Zhao's attacks and spell casts increase the duration of Awareness by {{ bonusdurationperswing }} seconds each.

The last champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or Audacious Charge is not knocked back.

riot_passive.name: Determination
riot_passive.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

i1.name: Determination
i1.blurb: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Every third basic attack [[on-hit]] or {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike deals {{as|{{pp|4|key=%|15 to 45|1 to 16|displayformula=15%+10% every 5 levels}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|heal|restores}} {{sti|health|{{pp|8 to 59|color=health}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|health}}}}.
i1.notes:
* Hitting one or more enemies with {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} applies one stack per strike. The bonus damage applies to all enemies of one strike, but the healing only once.
* {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} can generate and consume ''Determination'' stacks, but when consuming it shows no unique animation.

q1.name: Three Talon Strike
q1.blurb: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} For the next 5 seconds, '''Xin Zhao's''' next 3 basic attacks each deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduce his other [[Champion ability|ability]] {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} by 1 second each.
q1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 40*3}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.description2: Each ''Talon Strike'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
q1.description3: The third basic attack {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
q1.description4: ''Three Talon Strike'' resets '''Xin Zhao's''' basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* ''Three Talon Strike'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Xin Zhao's'' previous orders.
* ''Three Talon Strike's'' cooldown will begin only after the duration ends or the third enhanced attack is consumed.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only one empowered attack as well as the knockup.
* The enhanced attacks present input buffering during their wind-up animation (they cannot be canceled and ''Xin Zhao'' cannot be issued any commands until after it ends).
* ''Three Talon Strike'' are on-attack and do not interact with {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

w1.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
w1.blurb: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' performs two strikes over {{as|{{pp|type='''bonus''' attack speed|2|0.5;0.4|key1=%|0;140.5|displayformula=0.5-0.1 per 140.5% '''bonus''' attack speed. }}|attack speed}} seconds.
w1.leveling: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 30% AD)}}|Slash Minion-Damage|{{ap|30/2 to 70/2}} {{as|(+ 15% AD)}}}}
w1.description2: The first deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in an arc, and the second deals {{as|physical damage}} in a line, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 50% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Thrust Damage|{{ap|30 to 170}} {{as|(+ 75% AD)}}|Thrust Minion-Damage|{{ap|30/2 to 170/2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AD)}}}}
w1.description3: Both strikes deal 50% reduced damage against [[minion]]s, benefit from {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% of '''Xin Zhao's''' {{stil|life steal}} and the duration of his other abilities is paused during the effect.
w1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the thrust or the slash.

e1.name: Audacious Charge
e1.blurb: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby units and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
e1.description2: '''Xin Zhao''' then gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.

r1.name: Crescent Guard
r1.blurb: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Challenge:}} The last enemy champion targeted by '''Xin Zhao's''' [[basic attack]]s or {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} is ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' for 3 seconds.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Awareness:}} After {{fd|0.35}} seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' sweeps around him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, capped at 600 {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} against [[monster]]s, while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all non-''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' enemies hit.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 275}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
r1.description3: For the next 3 seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} against enemy champions more than 450-units away from him. His [[basic attack]]s and other [[champion ability|spell casts]] extend the duration by {{fd|0.3}} seconds.
r1.notes:
*Pets, clones, traps, bombs, DoTs, and delayed-damage skills will not damage '''Xin Zhao''' if the enemy champion source is outside the circle when the damage applies.
*Enemy minions, towers, and jungle monsters will damage '''Xin Zhao''' even when they are outside  {{ais|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} range.
*{{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} does not negate crowd control effects, it only negates the damage portion.
